#summary Describes the ulrice project.

= Introduction =

Ulrice (Universal Rich Client Environment) is a framework for building rich client applications. It consists of the following subprojects 
 * [UlriceCore The core framework]
 * [DataBinding A Data binding framework]
 * A Dashboard module
 * [Webstarter A webstarter]
